holidays.title: National Emo Day
holidays.description: The emo subculture has a long, storied history that reaches back to the 1980s.

holidays.title: National Hard Candy Day
holidays.description: Put the peanut butter balls and sugar cookies down, today is all about the hard stuff.

holidays.title: Goa Liberation Day
holidays.description: Goa is one of India’s smallest states and was under Portuguese possession for about 450 years.

holidays.title: Look for an Evergreen Day
holidays.description: If you still haven’t hunted down your Christmas tree, then you’re in luck!

holidays.title: National Harry Day
holidays.description: Learn the origins of the name Harry and why it remained so popular among boys.

holidays.title: National Heroes and Heroines Day
holidays.description: Take out your dancing shoes and join in the celebration as we honor Anguilla’s bravest people.

holidays.title: National Oatmeal Muffin Day
holidays.description: Healthy muffins that look like cupcakes and satisfy our sweet cravings? It doesn’t get better!

holidays.title: Alkaline’s Birthday
holidays.description: Making hits and headlines, this talented reggae artist is just getting started.

holidays.title: Alyssa Milano’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actress has entertained us for years now and is such a delight to watch.

holidays.title: Ashley Flowers’s Birthday
holidays.description: This podcast host has us at the edge of our seats every single time!

holidays.title: Cicely Tyson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This veteran actress wowed the world with her talent and integrity which influenced the movie industry.

holidays.title: Criss Angel’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a performer who always challenges himself and beats his own records as the best.

holidays.title: Delta Shepard’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are excited to see what the world has in store for this young star.

holidays.title: Elaine Joyce’s Birthday
holidays.description: Prepare to salute the multi-talented actress Elaine Joyce, who has a long list of accomplishments.

holidays.title: Hawkeye Huey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young champ teaches us that we can make a statement while we are young.

holidays.title: Hey.lexie’s Birthday
holidays.description: This social media sensation has already entertained us in the short span of her career.

holidays.title: Ines de Ramon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ines de Ramon is a queen living her best life — a beauty surrounded by mystery.

holidays.title: Jake Gyllenhaal’s Birthday
holidays.description: This formidable actor has a personality and acting skills that make him stand out.

holidays.title: Janet Guzman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Guzman is a stunning model who is taking social media by storm.

holidays.title: Jasmine Sorge’s Birthday
holidays.description: An American reality T.V. star, singer, and hairstylist — is there anything she can't do?

holidays.title: Jenelle Evans’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jenelle Evans has kept us on the edge of our seats all these years.

holidays.title: Nico Hiraga’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hiraga is a rare talent and he’s got what it takes to become an acting superstar.

holidays.title: Souline McBroom’s Birthday
holidays.description: Some are born stars and our cutie is one of those stars to watch out for.
